message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you get 10.  We can adjust as we go.
I'll start with a slightly more aggressive offer. Your turn to adjust!
I understand you're going for a bigger share, but let's meet in the middle. I'll take 70, you take 30. This way, we both get a decent amount, and we can avoid further rounds and inflation.
I'm not giving up yet! I'll meet you halfway this time, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Let's see if you'll accept a 50/50 split.
